title: Yakyuu no Hoshi Metman
original_name: 野球の星 メットマン
sinopse:
Sora is a teenager who has bet his life on comics. One day, he met a magical helmet named Koro, and he began playing baseball because of it?! Sora has always been lonely, but his new life leads him to meet new people and make new friends. But unexpectedly, his new friend was...?!

(Source: Elex Media Komputindo)
